headline.main: BILL TO REPEAL NEUTRALITY ACT IS UP TO SENATE; McKellar Acts to Make Clear-Cut Issue, Saying Law Plays Into Germany's Hands MISTAKE' IN FIRST PLACE Measure Is 'at War' With Our Age-Old Doctrine of Freedom of the Seas, He Says MOVES FOR REPEAL OF NEUTRALITY ACT

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 25 -- The Congressional drive to modify or repeal the Neutrality Act and return American merchant ships to full freedom of the seas took more definite form today with the introduction of an outright repealer by Senator McKellar of Tennessee.
abstract: Roosevelt's sea freedom policy backed by Sen McKellar
